wikipedia_page.main: Gwyn Griffin (1922–1967) was an English novelist.

response: * U-996 – Kriegsmarine U-boat, An Operational Necessity by Gwyn Griffin, 1967
Gwyn Griffin's best-selling 1967 novel An Operational Necessity was based on the Peleus Incident.
